name: N Gauge Unten Kibun Game: Gatan Goton
overview: N-Gauge Unten Kibun Game Gatan Goton is a Japanese train simulation game in the style of Taito's Densha de Go! with the important difference that N-Gauge is a model train simulator simulation game. The game features different game modes: - Normal mode: The main mode of the game, at the beginning only one route is avaliable, and there are some routes that the player have to reach in time. - Time Attack mode: Drive against time The game features also a museum with a description of all the trains that are in the game and the routes with images.
